event.description: Ian Kinsler grounds out, shortstop Orlando Cabrera to first baseman Jason Giambi.

Michael Young doubles (11) on a line drive to center fielder Ryan Sweeney.
Hank Blalock strikes out swinging.

Nelson Cruz called out on strikes.

Chris Davis strikes out swinging.

Pitching Change: Kevin Cameron replaces Trevor Cahill.
Jarrod Saltalamacchia singles on a line drive to center fielder Ryan Sweeney.
